ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Recurring_Business', ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Develop'), OR ( NOT(Export_Control_Check__c), NOT(Nuclear_Industry_Compliant__c), ISBLANK(Category_of_Interest__c), ISBLANK( System_Id_License_Numer__c), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To move to 'Develop' stage, please ensure below key fields are populated: • Export Control • Nuclear Industry Compliant • Category of Interest • System Id/License Number • Amount
